data.name: Memory Novel - Mile High Club
data.detailed_description:
Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of 2 flight attendants on a private jet, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.
Flip two cards, and if the words on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image.
All words are popular airport codes.

Features:
  • 12 different adult images to reveal.
  • Cards are shuffled randomly at each game, for maximum replay value.
  • Timer, to see how long it takes to solve a puzzle
  • Gallery where you can view all the puzzle images you have solved.
  • Relaxing music.

Be among the fastest players to achieve a top spot in our Leaderboards and unlock various achievements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
